articles.title: Microsoft's mammoth deal challenges Sony on the games front - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Xbox maker's purchase of Activision points to subscriptions overtaking consoles

articles.title: New Marvel star Gaspard Ulliel killed at 37 in ski accident - AsiaOne
articles.description: PARIS - French actor Gaspard Ulliel, known for appearing in Chanel perfume ads and portraying fashion designer Yves Saint Laurent in a 2014 biopic, has died at 37 following a ski accident in the Alps, French media reported on Wednesday. Ulliel, who won a Fren…
articles.content: PARIS - French actor Gaspard Ulliel, known for appearing in Chanel perfume ads and portraying fashion designer Yves Saint Laurent in a 2014 biopic, has died at 37 following a ski accident in the Alps… [+895 chars]
